short_summary: Supply and delivery of one Highway Tractor to Jasper, Alberta
description: This is amendment 1 to the original tender process. All subcontracting documents must be submitted by February 23, 2023 at 2:00PM GST. Delivery of the Tractor is expected on March 31, 2023.
full_summary:
